title: Breaking Fast Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Breaking Fast Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Breaking Fast Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 176
items.arabic: ((ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ وَابْتَلَّتِ العُرُوقُ، وَثَبَتَ الْأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ)).
items.translation: The thirst has gone and the veins are quenched, and reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.

items.title: Dua 177
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الَّتِي وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَنْ تَغْفِرَ لِي)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma inne as-aluka birahmatikal-latee wasiAAat kulla shay, an taghfira lee.
items.translation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy which envelopes all things, that You forgive me.
